mapper.select: SELECT AVG(grade) FROM t_review WHERE orderList_idx IN ( SELECT idx FROM t_orderlist WHERE pro_idx = #{storeId} )
SELECT COUNT(r.orderList_idx) AS reviewCount FROM T_review r JOIN T_orderList ol ON r.orderList_idx = ol.idx JOIN T_product p ON ol.pro_idx = p.idx WHERE p.idx = #{storeId};
SELECT r.useridx, r.content, r.grade, r.imgfile1, r.imgfile2, r.regDT FROM t_review r JOIN t_orderlist ol ON r.orderList_idx = ol.idx JOIN t_product p ON ol.pro_idx = p.idx WHERE p.idx = #{productId}
